comments:
Open the RCPMail view and select the subject label and update its text from
'Subject:' to 'Subjects:'. Once the snippet update finishes, do a reload from
scratch and the java beans view is in a wierd state with exceptions. Clicking on
the tree edit parts puts out some widget disposed message in console and the cpu
is maxed out.
